basics.name: Benton Snyder
basics.label: Lead Python Developer
basics.summary: Results-driven leader with a proven track record of building and leading high-performance teams to deliver impactful solutions and measurable business outcomes. Over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable applications and microservices.

work.summary: Lead Python developer for an agile team with multiple applications, APIs, and microservices.
highlights: Led multiple projects, developers, contractors, and vendor integrations.
Full SDLC on multiple applications and microservices including Django, Flask and FastAPI.
Modernized legacy applications including Python 2 to 3, sync to async implementations, and on-prem to AWS infrastructure.
Replaced batch processes with real-time streams using Kafka and CometD.
Containerized applications using Docker, Artifactory and Kubernetes.
Created and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Gitlab CI/CD.

work.summary: Developed multiple websites, plugins and services for a data center and its clients using Python and PHP.
highlights: Authored and enhanced multiple Joomla, WordPress and Magento sites and plugins.
Authored service automation scripts to provision, manage and audit the data center, products and services using Ansible and Fabric.
Authored client portal with integrations into multiple vendors and systems using Django and API client libraries.

work.summary: Developed websites and plugins using PHP.
highlights: Authored and enhanced multiple Joomla websites and extensions.

work.summary: Developed websites and plugins using PHP.
highlights: Authored and enhanced multiple Joomla websites and extensions.

awards.title: 2018 Performance Bonus
awards.description: Led major project for a new client portal within a condensed timeline that included multiple vendor and system integrations.

awards.title: 2019 Performance Bonus
awards.description: Volunteered technical assistance for a major project in response to a government audit.

awards.title: 2023 Performance Bonus
awards.description: Led a major project to overhaul the commission structure in response to marketplace fraud, completing it from notice to delivery within 4 weeks.
